alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:27PM EDT until August 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Delaware County in central New York... Northwestern Sullivan County in central New York... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 627 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Roscoe, or 15 miles northwest of Liberty, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockland, Liberty, Neversink, Parksville, Swan Lake, Loch Sheldrake, Hurleyville, Hazel, Willowemoc and White Sulphur Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
